Text:
Wow! You're a dream, Nomad!
Not only did you honor my request, you did it so quickly!
Thanks so much for this! You made my day! 
Dig your choices for 80s and 90s movies. 

I do have more requests for you to consider...
One more sentimental fantasy. 
And an underrated 80s action film with a budget!

Another cool torrent you recently uploaded.

Thanks again for everything! Have a good one!
